entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Aupaluk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Aupaluk Airport 06:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -38.9°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -56
Dewpoint: -42.7°C
Wind: WSW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 33.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 33. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 54 this evening and minus 59 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
